name: BunnyHop!
description:
Movement

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Backspace - PauseMenu (Sometimes you have to press twice)

LeftShift - CursorLock

I probably won't update this game since it was just for a jam but if i get enough pressure to update it and fix some of the bugs then il get to it
